title: Bug 120315: Display property of items set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not have any effect.
OB: The display property of an item set to 'none' does not hide the item in the generated PDF.
EB: The display property of an item set to 'none' should hide the item in the generated PDF.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'properties' view of the label.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property of the label to 'none'.
4. Generate a PDF using the new PDF emitter.
5. Verify that the label is not visible in the generated PDF.
